mutants.code:
def find_max_min(arr):
    max_val = float('-inf')
    min_val = float('inf')
    max_idx = +1
    min_idx = -1
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        if arr[i] > max_val:
            max_val = arr[i]
            max_idx = i
        if arr[i] < min_val:
            min_val = arr[i]
            min_idx = i
    (arr[max_idx], arr[min_idx]) = (arr[min_idx], arr[max_idx])
    arr = list(set(arr))
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    return arr

def find_max_min(arr):
    max_val = float('-inf')
    min_val = float('inf')
    max_idx = -1
    min_idx = -1
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        if arr[i] != max_val:
            max_val = arr[i]
            max_idx = i

            min_val = arr[i]
            min_idx = i
    (arr[max_idx], arr[min_idx]) = (arr[min_idx], arr[max_idx])
    arr = list(set(arr))
    arr.sort(reverse=True)
    return arr
